archimate:Node.name: Industrial connector : Layer 1
archimate:Node.documentation: PLC OPC UA Data Sources: This system will interface with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) that utilize the OPC UA standard for communication. This ensures seamless data acquisition from machinery and equipment, providing a robust foundation for real-time monitoring and control. OPC UA Aggregate Server: To centralize data collection, an OPC UA Aggregate Server will be deployed. This server will gather and consolidate data from multiple OPC UA sources, offering a unified data stream to our cloud services, enhancing both reliability and efficiency. S/W: Kempware, Ignition
